General.Name: Supreme Cable Manufacturing Corp
General.Description: PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cables, and insulation and melamine products in Indonesia. The company offers high and medium voltage, OPGW, airport lighting, low voltage AL PVC/XLPE insulated, low voltage armour and non armour, flexible, instrumentation, fiber optic, solar, telecommunication, low voltage fire resistant and flame retardant, LAN, spacer, and high voltage composite reinforced conductor cables, as well as bare conductors, and building and enamelled wires. It also manufactures pellet cross linked polyethylene and poly-vinyl chloride products; melamine, resin, and melamine sheet products; and plastic and cable reel products. The company was formerly known as PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing Corporation Tbk and changed its name to PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk in October 2006. PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Kebon Sirih No. 71, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10340
